About Us

It is one of the leading Syrian companies in the field of perfumes since the beginning of the twentieth century At the end of 2009, Aroma Best Perfume started its activity in the Lebanese market, and in 2015 it started its activity in a ready-made perfume filling factory in Sudan, And a follow-up to its path of expansion outside the Syrian market In 2022, it started its activity in the Turkish market to meet market demands, and to be present in the global perfume markets.
